title: IELTS Speaking Full Mock Exam 011
part1: How often do you prepare meals at home?
What is your favourite dish to cook?
Did you learn cooking from someone in your family?
Do you enjoy trying new recipes?
How important is healthy eating to you?

cueCard: Describe a meal that left a lasting impression on you.
and explain why it was memorable.

part3: Why do people enjoy eating together?
How has globalisation affected local cuisines?
Should schools teach children how to cook?
Do you think our diets will change significantly in the future?
